page.title: 09Running a "Stately Home" / 2
page.content:
All this has to be developed on as firm a basis as any other business undertaking, and a right formula has been found so that it{fits sensitively {into the particular society}existing in south-east Yorkshire.
{Burton Constable Hall}is able to share its treasures, provide a gracious atmosphere for its guests, recreation for visitors, and a home for the family in whose possession it has been for so many centuries.
----------------
Pages 1-9 compiled with the help of Mr. and Mrs. Geoffrey Gregory Mrs.Jean Willis and Michael Mr.Karl Wilcock, Inspector R. Lee and edited by Rev.Roger Pickering
